definition[0]: someone who works at the checkout in a supermarket
definition[1]: someone who makes sure that something is written or done correctly
definition[2]: a computer program that checks spelling or grammar
example[0]: an automatic grammar checker that searches for missing words, bad punctuation etc
definition[3]: someone whose job is to check that things are correct or done correctly
definition[4]: someone who works in a SUPERMARKET, adding up the cost of the goods people buy
